doc:
Shelley Malil https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shelley_Malil 0 Shelley Mathew Malil (; born December 23, 1964) is an American criminal and former actor. Malil emigrated to the United States in 1974. He appeared in a number of television shows and films, including The 40-Year-Old Virgin (2005). In 2010, Malil was convicted of attempted premeditated murder and assault with a deadly weapon on a former girlfriend, and served a 14 year to life term at Chuckawalla Valley State Prison in southern California. Shelley_Mathew_Malil ( ; born December_23_,_1964 ) is an_American_criminal_and_former_actor . Malil emigrated to the_United_States in 1974 . He appeared in a_number of television_shows_and_films , including The_40-Year-Old_Virgin_(_2005_) . In 2010 , Malil was_convicted of attempted_premeditated_murder_and_assault with a_deadly_weapon on a_former_girlfriend , and served a_14_year to life_term at Chuckawalla_Valley_State_Prison in southern_California .
